recipes.name: Espresso
recipes.description: A concentrated shot of coffee with a rich crema
instructions: Grind coffee beans to a fine consistency
Tamp the grounds evenly in the portafilter
Extract for 25-30 seconds
Serve immediately in a warm cup

recipes.name: Americano
recipes.description: Espresso diluted with hot water for a milder flavor
instructions: Pull a double shot of espresso
Add hot water to desired strength
For iced version, add cold water and ice

recipes.name: Cappuccino
recipes.description: Equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam
instructions: Pull a double shot of espresso
Steam milk to create microfoam
Pour steamed milk over espresso
Top with a thick layer of foam
Optional: dust with cocoa powder

recipes.name: Caffè Latte
recipes.description: Espresso with steamed milk and a light foam layer
instructions: Pull a double shot of espresso
Steam milk until silky smooth
Pour steamed milk gently over espresso
Create latte art if desired
For iced: pour over ice instead

recipes.name: Flat White
recipes.description: Double espresso with velvety steamed milk, less foam than latte
instructions: Pull a double shot of espresso
Steam milk to create silky microfoam
Pour milk in a steady stream
Result should be velvety smooth throughout

recipes.name: Caffè Mocha
recipes.description: Espresso with chocolate and steamed milk
instructions: Add chocolate syrup to cup
Pull a double shot of espresso over chocolate
Stir to combine
Add steamed milk
Top with whipped cream if desired

recipes.name: Marocchino
recipes.description: Layers of cocoa powder, espresso, and milk foam
instructions: Dust the bottom of a small glass cup with cocoa powder
Pull a shot of espresso over the cocoa
Dust the espresso with more cocoa powder
Top with milk froth until the cup is full
Finish with a final dusting of cocoa

recipes.name: Bicerin
recipes.description: Traditional Turin drink with espresso, chocolate, and milk
instructions: Prepare thick hot chocolate
Pour hot chocolate into the bottom of a glass
Carefully layer espresso over the chocolate
Top with a layer of whole milk or lightly whipped cream
Do not stir before serving

recipes.name: Espresso Macchiato
recipes.description: Espresso 'stained' with a dollop of milk foam
instructions: Pull a double shot of espresso
Steam a small amount of milk
Add a dollop of foam to mark the espresso

recipes.name: Cortado
recipes.description: Equal parts espresso and warm milk to reduce acidity
instructions: Pull a double shot of espresso
Steam milk with minimal foam
Pour equal amount of milk into espresso

recipes.name: Cold Brew
recipes.description: Coffee steeped in cold water for a smooth, less acidic taste
instructions: Coarsely grind coffee beans
Combine coffee and cold water in container
Steep in refrigerator for 12-24 hours
Strain through fine mesh or filter
Dilute concentrate 1:1 with water or milk
Serve over ice

recipes.name: Iced Latte
recipes.description: Chilled espresso with cold milk over ice
instructions: Fill glass with ice
Pull a double shot of espresso
Pour cold milk over ice
Add espresso over the milk
Stir gently and serve

recipes.name: Iced Cappuccino
recipes.description: Chilled espresso with cold frothed milk
instructions: Fill glass with ice
Pull a double shot of espresso
Froth cold milk using a frother
Pour espresso over ice
Top with cold frothed milk

recipes.name: Frappé
recipes.description: Blended iced coffee with a frothy texture
instructions: Add coffee, milk, ice, and sugar to blender
Blend until smooth and frothy
Pour into tall glass
Top with whipped cream if desired

recipes.name: Pour Over
recipes.description: Manual brewing method for a clean, nuanced cup
instructions: Place filter in dripper and rinse with hot water
Add medium-ground coffee
Bloom with 50ml water for 30 seconds
Pour remaining water in slow circles
Total brew time should be 3-4 minutes

recipes.name: French Press
recipes.description: Full-bodied immersion brew with natural oils
instructions: Add coarsely ground coffee to press
Pour hot water and stir briefly
Place lid on and steep for 4 minutes
Press plunger down slowly
Pour immediately to avoid over-extraction

recipes.name: Affogato
recipes.description: Espresso poured over vanilla gelato or ice cream
instructions: Place scoops of vanilla gelato in cup
Pull a shot of espresso
Pour hot espresso directly over gelato
Serve immediately with a spoon

recipes.name: Vietnamese Coffee
recipes.description: Strong drip coffee with sweetened condensed milk
instructions: Add condensed milk to bottom of glass
Place phin filter on top of glass
Add coffee grounds to filter
Pour small amount of water to bloom
Fill filter with remaining water
Wait for coffee to drip through
Stir and serve hot or over ice

recipes.name: Nitro Cold Brew
recipes.description: Cold brew infused with nitrogen for a creamy, stout-like texture
instructions: Prepare cold brew concentrate
Charge with nitrogen using a nitro system
Pour from tap into glass
Do not add ice - served cold from tap
Enjoy the cascading effect

recipes.name: Irish Coffee
recipes.description: Hot coffee with Irish whiskey and cream
instructions: Warm your glass with hot water
Add brown sugar and whiskey
Pour in hot coffee and stir
Float lightly whipped cream on top
Do not stir - drink through cream

grindSizes.name: Extra Fine
grindSizes.description: Powdery, like flour - for Turkish coffee

grindSizes.name: Medium-Fine
grindSizes.description: Finer than sand - for pour over

grindSizes.name: Coarse
grindSizes.description: Like sea salt - for French press
